channel.title: War Bush Politics Politic Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Bush Politics Politic Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Whoa..
item.description: Bush is now being compared to hitler by his peers. Whoa. In a surprise move, the UN has upset Bush’s plans for WAR. I guess they really didn’t like his plan all that well. Maybe it was because Iraq has no weapons of mass destrution. – In other news, there is absolutely no racial profiling by the air marshals. and the “terrorists” from the south apparently did pay their toll. wtf!
